profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 XMP Package - PDF/A Identification Schema.
profile.description: The value of pdfaid:part shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rules.rule:
<<<<<<< HEAD The value of pdfaid:part shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms. ======= The PDF/A version of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema. >>>>>>> refs/remotes/veraPDF/integration part == 1
The "part" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is %1 instead of 1 for PDF/A-1b conforming file. part
ISO 19005-1:2005 6.7.11
